author: Kripa Charan
title: 31 Powerful Nude Portraits That Show The Vulnerability Of Humans (NSFW)
text:
IN Creative ON 22 Feb, 2017 31 Powerful Nude Portraits That Show The Vulnerability Of Humans (NSFW) Share on twitter Follow Us On 
Showing off photoshopped nudes on social media platform sets unrealistic body standards especially for young girls. Where people shame others for editing their photos, people are also shamed for having jiggly thighs, a plus size, and even for being thin. 
Artist Aleah Chapin 's recent exhibition 'Body / Being' shows the reality of different body types in her series of honest nude portraits . Chapin says, "The whole point of [my current exhibit] is to show that we are all the same in the end, no matter if we are an 84-year-old man or a 30-year-old trans individual. We all have struggles and experiences of being in a body, and if we could just focus on what we have in common instead of being afraid and judgmental of our differences, I think the world would be a much kinder place." 
Have a look at these beautiful portraits: 31 Powerful Nude Portraits That Show The Vulnerability Of Humans (NSFW) 754 396
